repairedDockerfile:
# NODE
FROM node:8-alpine

#Â LABELS
LABEL version="1.x.x"
LABEL description="Speckle Server Docker Container Image"

# CREATE DIRS
RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

# INSTALL
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

COPY . .
CMD ["node", "server.js"]
